original: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ
paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya
vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca … satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā catuvīsa …pe…
